### Data Overview

The result of exploratory data analysis can reveal a lot about your data. One factor it can bubble up is how clean the data is, and if there needs to be any interventions done before we start training models. Cleaning your data is an important next step.  If your data is garbage, you will create a garbage forecast. [Gargbage in, garbage out.](https://mftokic.github.io/posts/2024-04-08-time-series-garbage/)
